name: Uwaki Hittoman (V0.97)
description:
In the dark of the future....An awesome future..... One old man is dragged from his home under a bridge and brought to The Cloud for questioning. Although the bar code on his neck has long since been removed, his work is remembered. The woman in front of him is his handler now. And she has questions for Agent 47.

Use the spacebar to advance. During interactable scenes mouse around to find interactable objects. One or two art assets are not final versions but will be updated in the future.

** Credits: **

A Game by- Ryland H Garnett (rilen), @meatNbones

Lead Artist - Thomas Bousquet (vimes)

3D Art – Sam Richards (Mythalore), @Mythalore

Music by Joel Whitaker, @joelwmusic

Voice of Agent 47: Jon Coughlin, coughlinjon @clicktozoom

Voice of The Handler: Tessa Racked, @tessa_racked

Voice of Steve Gaynor: William Lett, @wrokandwrol

Moral Support – Kevin Nie, @kevinnie8

We Don't Talk About Brett
